summary: The Q1 2024 product roadmap review discussed customer feedback, feature prioritization, and technical capabilities. The team agreed on the priority order for Q1 features and identified opportunities for growth. Risks and concerns were also discussed, including technical and market risks.
risks: Technical risk: database architecture may not scale well for real-time analytics
Market risk: competitors launching similar analytics features
opportunities: Mobile-First Customers: penetrating new verticals like field services and retail

action_items.task: Investigate database scaling options and provide cost estimate
Create onboarding tutorial scripts for new features
Draft sales collateral highlighting AI-powered insights differentiation
Assign engineering pods to each Q1 feature and create detailed sprint plans
